lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s announcement that he would begin construction of a new Pennsylvania Station this year includes Senator Daniel Patrick Moynihan’s long-ago suggestion: Use the Farley building.
snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s announcement that he would begin construction of a new Pennsylvania Station this year includes Senator Daniel Patrick Moynihan’s long-ago suggestion: Use the Farley building.

headline.main: An Idea by Moynihan Rises Like a Phoenix: Relocating Pennsylvania Station
headline.print_headline: An Idea by Moynihan Rises Like a Phoenix: Relocating Pennsylvania Station

abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column reflects on fact that New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo's announced plan to break ground on reconstruction of Pennsylvania Station in Manhattan borrows from proposal by late Sen Daniel Patrick Moynihan issued decades ago; notes Moynihan was first to propose that James A Farley post office building across from station be turned into transit hub.
